original_text: So Joshua took the whole land, according to all that the Lord had spoken to Moses. And Joshua gave it for an inheritance to Israel according to their tribal allotments. And the land had rest from war.
korean_text: 이와 같이 여호수아가 여호와께서 모세에게 말씀하신 대로 그 온 땅을 점령하여 이스라엘 지파의 구분에 따라 기업으로 주매 그 땅에 전쟁이 그쳤더라

sentences.original_text: So Joshua took the whole land,
according to all that the Lord had spoken to Moses.
And Joshua gave it for an inheritance to Israel
And the land had rest from war.
